quote1.text: Kabhi kabhi khud se bhi milna chahiye.
quote1.author: Samar Kumar

quote2.text: Zindagi ek safar hai, manzil to bas ek bahaana hai.
quote2.author: Samar Kumar

quote3.text: Har muskurahat ke peeche ek kahani hoti hai.
quote3.author: Anonymous

quote4.text: Chhoti chhoti baatein hi khushiyon ka sabab hoti hain.
quote4.author: Samar Kumar

quote5.text: bahut chupate ho gum samar jii
quote5.author: Samar Kumar

quote6.text: i made this website for fun to learn how to add databse.
quote6.author: Samar Kumar
